items.name: tailwind-mixin
items.title: Tailwind Mixin
items.description: A set of Tailwind CSS mixins for Lit components, enabling easy integration of Tailwind styles within web components.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: An atomic button component built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Supports multiple variants and sizes for versatile use in web applications.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: A badge component built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Supports multiple variants for different use cases.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: A card component built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Includes subcomponents for header, title, description, action, content, and footer.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: field
items.title: Field
items.description: Form field components for creating accessible form layouts with labels, descriptions, and error messages. Includes fieldset, legend, and field grouping utilities.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A text input component built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Supports various input types and states.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: A versatile item component using named slots for flexible content composition. Includes group and separator components for organizing lists.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: A popover component built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Uses Floating UI for positioning with support for flip, shift, and arrow options.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A tooltip component that displays information when an element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it. Built with Lit and uses Floating UI for smart positioning.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button. Built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Features keyboard navigation, typeahead search, and form integration.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked. Built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Supports controlled and uncontrolled modes with form integration.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time. Built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Features keyboard navigation and accessible ARIA attributes.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off. Built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Supports multiple variants and sizes with form integration.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: An opinionated toast notification component for displaying messages. Built with Lit and styled using Tailwind CSS. Supports success, error, info, warning, and loading states with icons. Features promise support, action buttons, and multiple visual variants.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: A responsive table component for displaying tabular data. Uses a simple wrapper component with CSS-based styling for native HTML table elements.
items.author: Lloyd Richards <lloyd.d.richards@gmail.com>
